resource.chars:
It is not clear <s<[text?]<\s> by what channel 
fecundation takes place - whether <s>the [text?]<\s>
each salpa B, impregnates its own ovum by 
discharging the contents of its own testis into 
the circulating fluid - which would be a 
procedure altogether anomalous
or whether on the other hand, impregnation 
do not rather take place from without -
a presumption which is strengthened by 
analogy <s>[text?]<\s> and by the fact, that the testis 
does not seem to attain maturity early enough 
to fecundate its own ovum - The spermatic 
fluid may have access to the ovum by 
<s>accessing <\s> the gubernaculum becoming hollow 
and tubular - as will be seen to be the case 
in the Pyrosomata - and indications 
of such an occurrence have occasionally 
manifested themselves.
